dosageInstruction.text: Cyclophosphamide 600 mg/m^2 IV over 30 minutes D1

text.div:
AC followed by Paclitaxel + Trastuzumab Course 1

Name: Cyclophosphamide in AC (Doxorubicin + Cyclophosphamide)

Course: 1

Agent Protocols Options:

Cyclophosphamide 600 mg/m^2 IV over 30 minutes D1

Cycle length: Q21D x 4 cycles
